name: Sorting Fiasco
description:
You are a collect. collect all the items that you can. grab each item with the appropriate Item in your hot bar. This game is Infinite so play as much as you like 

Hammer - toolbox

Coins - Piggybank

Donuts - Donut Box

Bomb - Water bucket 

Bread - Bread Basket

Try not to drop anything!

See how long you can play and what type of score you get.

once the game jam is over I will update it to add subtraction if you grab the wrong item.
